filesystem.description: Node.js server implementing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for filesystem operations.

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the complete contents of a file from the file system. Handles various text encodings and provides detailed error messages if the file cannot be read. Use this tool when you need to examine the contents of a single file. Only works within allowed directories.

path.description: Path to the file to read

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: Read the contents of multiple files simultaneously. This is more efficient than reading files one by one when you need to analyze or compare multiple files. Each file's content is returned with its path as a reference.

paths.description: Array of file paths to read

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path. Results clearly distinguish between files and directories with [FILE] and [DIR] prefixes.

path.description: Path to the directory to list

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access. Use this to understand which directories are available before trying to access files.

excel.description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that reads and writes MS Excel data.

tools.name: excel_describe_sheets
tools.description: List all sheet information of specified Excel file including sheet names and dimensions.

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

tools.name: excel_read_sheet
tools.description: Read values from Excel sheet. Returns cell values as a structured table.

fileAbsolutePath.description: Absolute path to the Excel file

sheetName.description: Sheet name in the Excel file

music-analysis.description: Model Context Provider (MCP) that uses librosa for audio analysis on local audio files.

tools.name: load
tools.description: Loads an audio file and returns a reference to the audio time series for further analysis.

offset.description: Start reading after this time (in seconds)

duration.description: Only load this much audio (in seconds)

tools.name: get_duration
tools.description: Returns the total duration (in seconds) of the given audio time series.

path_audio_time_series_y.description: Reference to a loaded audio time series

tools.name: tempo
tools.description: Estimates the tempo (in BPM) of the given audio time series using librosa.

path_audio_time_series_y.description: Reference to a loaded audio time series

tools.name: beat_track
tools.description: Computes the beat track of the given audio time series. Returns beat frames and tempo.

path_audio_time_series_y.description: Reference to a loaded audio time series

biomcp.description: BioMCP is a toolkit that empowers AI assistants with specialized biomedical knowledge. It connects AI systems to authoritative biomedical data sources for clinical trials, scientific literature, and genomic variants.

tools.name: trial_protocol_getter
tools.description: Fetch core protocol information for a clinical trial. Retrieves official title, brief summary, study status, sponsor information, study design, eligibility criteria, and primary completion date.

mcp-simple-arxiv.description: An MCP server that provides access to arXiv papers through their API.

tools.name: get_paper_data
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific paper including title, authors, abstract, submission date, and available formats.

tools.name: search_papers
tools.description: Search for papers on arXiv by title and abstract content. Supports advanced search syntax.

query.description: Search query to match against paper titles and abstracts

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

arxiv-mcp-server.description: The ArXiv MCP Server provides a bridge between AI assistants and arXiv's research repository. It allows AI models to search for papers and access their content.

tools.name: search_papers
tools.description: Search for papers on arXiv with advanced filtering by date, category, and keywords.

maven-deps-server.description: An MCP server that provides tools for checking Maven dependency versions. Enables verification of Maven dependencies and retrieval of their latest versions from Maven Central Repository.

tools.name: get_latest_release
tools.description: Get the latest release version of a Maven dependency (excludes pre-releases by default).

pdf-reader-mcp.description: MCP server for reading and extracting information from PDF files including text, metadata, and page count.

tools.name: read_pdf
tools.description: Reads content and metadata from one or more PDF files. Can extract text from specific pages.

sources.description: Array of PDF sources to process

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List PDF files in a directory.

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access.

word-document-server.description: MCP server for creating, reading, and manipulating Microsoft Word documents. Enables AI assistants to work with Word documents through a standardized interface.

tools.name: get_document_text
tools.description: Extract all text from a Word document.

searxng.description: A powerful MCP server providing comprehensive document processing capabilities including reading, converting, and transforming various document formats.

tools.name: document_reader
tools.description: Read content from document files at specified paths, supporting formats: .pdf, .docx, .txt, .html, .csv, .xlsx

filePath.description: Path to the file to be read

tools.name: excel_read
tools.description: Read Excel file and convert to JSON format while preserving structure.

tools.name: docx_to_html
tools.description: Convert DOCX to HTML while preserving formatting.
